title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
image_desc:
A futuristic cityscape with glowing holographic displays showing data streams and AI interfaces. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
A stock footage video showing a fast-paced montage of technological advancements, including AI-related imagery.
narration: Welcome to this brief introduction to Artificial Intelligence.  In this presentation, we'll explore the basics of AI and its impact on our world.

title: AI: Capabilities and Applications
content:
**Column 1: Capabilities**
Machine Learning
Natural Language Processing
Computer Vision
**Column 2: Applications**
Healthcare Diagnostics
Self-Driving Cars
Personalized Recommendations
image_desc:
A split image showing a doctor using AI-powered diagnostic tools on one side and a self-driving car navigating a city street on the other. Type: photo collage

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: AI's capabilities are constantly expanding.  We see machine learning powering algorithms that learn from data, natural language processing enabling computers to understand human language, and computer vision allowing computers to "see" and interpret images.  These capabilities are already transforming various sectors.  In healthcare, AI assists in diagnostics, improving accuracy and efficiency.  Self-driving cars rely heavily on AI for navigation and safety.  And personalized recommendations, from movies to shopping, are powered by AI algorithms analyzing user data.  These are just a few examples of AI's growing impact.
